Text:
You could call them "rartards" ... the whole of "The Scene" qualifies - RAR mandated there.

Anyway, someone correct me if I'm wrong - but LOL & DIMENSION use the same source - damaged in this case: Probably AFG & MSD as well ...

Glitch @ 05:35

Confirmed - the glitch is there to their everlasting shame.

Did you know they used to produce FLAWLESS xvid avi?

Maybe the Mayans were right - December 21st is soooo close ...
